name: Sacred Vault
content:
Sacred Vault

An ancient repository of holy artifacts and relics. Primary Objectives are relic chambers. Secondary markers are guardian posts or offering altars. The walls are lined with sacred symbols and protective wards.


Terrain Features:

  • Relic chambers
  • Guardian posts
  • Offering altars
  • Protective wards

Atmosphere:

The air is still and heavy with the weight of ancient power. The walls glow with protective wards, and the sound of distant prayers echoes through the vaults.
